name: ImageNet (ILSVRC)
description: The benchmark dataset that launched the deep learning revolution — 14 million labeled images across 20,000+ categories. Essential for image classification research and model benchmarking.

name: Common Crawl
description: A massive open repository of web crawl data containing petabytes of raw web page data, metadata, and text extractions. Used to train many of the largest language models.

name: Attention Is All You Need
description: The seminal 2017 paper by Vaswani et al. that introduced the Transformer architecture, revolutionizing NLP and eventually all of deep learning.

name: Scaling Laws for Neural Language Models
description: Kaplan et al.'s influential paper showing that model performance follows predictable power laws as compute, data, and parameters increase. Shaped the development of GPT-3 and beyond.

name: OpenAI API
description: Access GPT-4, GPT-5, DALL·E, Whisper, and more through a simple REST API. The most widely used commercial AI API with extensive documentation and SDKs.

name: Hugging Face Inference API
description: Run inference on 500,000+ models hosted on Hugging Face Hub through simple HTTP requests. Free tier available for experimentation.

name: fast.ai — Practical Deep Learning
description: The gold standard free course for learning deep learning. Uses a top-down teaching approach — you'll train models from day one, then gradually understand the theory behind them.

name: 3Blue1Brown — Neural Networks Series
description: Grant Sanderson's visually stunning video series that builds intuition for neural networks, backpropagation, and gradient descent through beautiful animations.

name: Arxiv Sanity Preserver
description: Andrej Karpathy's tool for browsing, searching, and filtering arXiv papers. Helps researchers stay on top of the latest ML publications without drowning in the firehose of daily papers.

name: SQuAD 2.0
description: The Stanford Question Answering Dataset — 150K+ question-answer pairs with unanswerable questions. A fundamental benchmark for evaluating reading comprehension and QA systems.
